data.message: Hello facebook I want to  ask some important thing to you plz help I want to inbox but currently it's not happening y.

replies.message: Hey there, Qasim. This is a great place to ask a question. Let us know how we can help. -Jordan

Facebook I have filed a report about a page who is using my page name and photos. This fake page is pretending to be my page. After reporting this page your team concluded there is nothing the matter and is letting this page continue there plagiarism.

When reporting such a violation of your community policy fb does not offer an sufficient possibility to describe what's really the matter. I've also left feedback after fb denying my report for this imposter page and so far fb ignored my feedback.

Since fb does not offer the right means for reporting this kind of bullying it may be obvious that it's almost impossible to get in contact with FB to explain properly in person what is going on.

I don’t want to give up or change the name my page, I was the first using this name and what I would like to see is that fb to force the other page to change it’s name.

Please help me, the guy behind this page is driving me crazy and i’m almost sick and tired of being bullied this way.

Can you help me by providing me with an mail address or phone number in The Netherlands or can you get in contact with me so I can explain in person to Facebook what's really going on.
